mapper.select: select location, lat, lng, sum(total_price) total_price from (select * from tbl_ft_sales where u_id=#{u_id}) as sales inner join tbl_ft_order as orders on sales.sno = orders.sno group by sales.location

select date_format(work_date, '%y-%m-%d') ymd, sum(total_price) daily_sales from (select * from tbl_ft_sales where u_id=#{u_id}) as sales inner join tbl_ft_order as orders on sales.sno = orders.sno group by ymd;

select date_format(work_date, '%y-%m') ym, sum(total_price) monthly_sales from (select * from tbl_ft_sales where u_id=#{u_id}) as sales inner join tbl_ft_order as orders on sales.sno = orders.sno group by ym;
